verses.verse: כְּדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> When Ephraim רְתֵ֔ת <S%H7578><s%> trembling נָשָׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> he exalted ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> himself בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> himself in Israel וַיֶּאְשַׁ֥ם <S%H816><s%> but when he offended בַּבַּ֖עַל <S%H1168><s%> in Baal וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> he died

וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H6258><s%> and now יוֹסִ֣פוּ <S%H3254><s%> more and more לַחֲטֹ֗א <S%H2398><s%> And now they sin וַיַּעְשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and have made לָהֶם֩ מַסֵּכָ֨ה <S%H4541><s%> them molten images מִכַּסְפָּ֤ם <S%H3701><s%> of their silver כִּתְבוּנָם֙ <S%H8394><s%> according to their own understanding עֲצַבִּ֔ים <S%H6091><s%> [and] idols מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> all of it the work חָרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2796><s%> of the craftsmen כֻּלֹּ֑ה <S%H3605><s%> All לָהֶם֙ הֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> They אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> they say זֹבְחֵ֣י <S%H2076><s%> that sacrifice אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of them Let the men עֲגָלִ֖ים <S%H5695><s%> the calves יִשָּׁקֽוּן׃ <S%H5401><s%> kiss

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִֽהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become כַּעֲנַן־ <S%H6051><s%> cloud בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Therefore they shall be as the morning וְכַטַּ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> dew מַשְׁכִּ֣ים <S%H7925><s%> and as the early הֹלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that passeth away כְּמֹץ֙ <S%H4671><s%> as the chaff יְסֹעֵ֣ר <S%H5590><s%> [that] is driven with the whirlwind מִגֹּ֔רֶן <S%H1637><s%> out of the floor וּכְעָשָׁ֖ן <S%H6227><s%> and as the smoke מֵאֲרֻבָּֽה׃ <S%H699><s%> out of the chimney

וְאָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yet I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וֵאלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> no god זֽוּלָתִי֙ <S%H2108><s%> but me לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not תֵדָ֔ע <S%H3045><s%> and thou shalt know וּמוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> for [there is] no saviour אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> there בִּלְתִּֽי׃ <S%H1115><s%> beside me
אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְדַעְתִּ֖יךָ <S%H3045><s%> I did know בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> thee in the wilderness בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land תַּלְאֻבֽוֹת׃ <S%H8514><s%> of great drought

כְּמַרְעִיתָם֙ <S%H4830><s%> According to their pasture וַיִּשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <S%H7646><s%> so were they filled שָׂבְע֖וּ <S%H7646><s%> they were filled וַיָּ֣רָם <S%H7311><s%> was exalted לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> and their heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that שְׁכֵחֽוּנִי׃ <S%H7911><s%> therefore have they forgotten

וָאֱהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֖ם כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> will be like שָׁ֑חַל <S%H7826><s%> Therefore I will be unto them as a lion כְּנָמֵ֖ר <S%H5246><s%> as a leopard עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way אָשֽׁוּר׃ <S%H7789><s%> will I observe

אֶפְגְּשֵׁם֙ <S%H6298><s%> I will meet כְּדֹ֣ב <S%H1677><s%> them as a bear שַׁכּ֔וּל <S%H7909><s%> [that is] bereaved וְאֶקְרַ֖ע <S%H7167><s%> [of her whelps] and will rend סְג֣וֹר <S%H5458><s%> the caul לִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> of their heart וְאֹכְלֵ֥ם <S%H398><s%> and there will I devour שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> There כְּלָבִ֔יא <S%H3833><s%> them like a lion חַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> beast הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> the wild תְּבַקְּעֵֽם׃ <S%H1234><s%> shall tear
שִֽׁחֶתְךָ֥ <S%H7843><s%> thou hast destroyed יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בִ֥י בְעֶזְרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5828><s%> thyself but in me [is] thine help

אֱהִ֤י <S%H165><s%> I will מַלְכְּךָ֙ <S%H4428><s%> be thy king אֵפ֔וֹא <S%H645><s%> where וְיוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֖ <S%H3467><s%> [is any other] that may save בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֶ֑יךָ <S%H5892><s%> your cities וְשֹׁ֣פְטֶ֔יךָ <S%H8199><s%> and your judges אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> of whom אָמַ֔רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> of whom thou saidst תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Give לִּ֖י מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> me a king וְשָׂרִֽים׃ <S%H8269><s%> captain
אֶֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> I gave לְךָ֥ מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> thee a king בְּאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> in mine anger וְאֶקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> and took בְּעֶבְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H5678><s%> [him] away in my wrath ס
צָרוּר֙ <S%H6887><s%> [is] bound up עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> The iniquity אֶפְרָ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim צְפוּנָ֖ה <S%H6845><s%> [is] hid חַטָּאתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2403><s%> his sin

חֶבְלֵ֥י <S%H2256><s%> The sorrows יֽוֹלֵדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> of a travailing woman יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come ל֑וֹ הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> he בֵן֙ <S%H1121><s%> son לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> is not חָכָ֔ם <S%H2450><s%> upon him he [is] an unwise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is not עֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> long לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> for he should not stay בְּמִשְׁבַּ֥ר <S%H4866><s%> in [the place of] the breaking forth בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> of children

מִיַּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> them from the power שְׁאוֹל֙ <S%H7585><s%> of the grave אֶפְדֵּ֔ם <S%H6299><s%> I will ransom מִמָּ֖וֶת <S%H4194><s%> them from death אֶגְאָלֵ֑ם <S%H1350><s%> I will redeem אֱהִ֨י <S%H165><s%> I will דְבָרֶיךָ֜ <S%H1698><s%> be thy plagues מָ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> O death אֱהִ֤י <S%H165><s%> I will קָֽטָבְךָ֙ <S%H6987><s%> be thy destruction שְׁא֔וֹל <S%H7585><s%> O grave נֹ֖חַם <S%H5164><s%> repentance יִסָּתֵ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> shall be hid מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> from mine eyes

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּ֥ן <S%H996><s%> among אַחִ֖ים <S%H251><s%> among [his] brethren יַפְרִ֑יא <S%H6500><s%> Though he be fruitful יָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come קָדִים֩ <S%H6921><s%> an east wind ר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מִמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> from the wilderness עֹלֶ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> shall come up וְיֵב֤וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> shall become dry מְקוֹרוֹ֙ <S%H4726><s%> and his spring וְיֶחֱרַ֣ב <S%H2717><s%> shall be dried up מַעְיָנ֔וֹ <S%H4599><s%> and his fountain ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> It יִשְׁסֶ֔ה <S%H8154><s%> he shall spoil אוֹצַ֖ר <S%H214><s%> the treasure כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every כְּלִ֥י <S%H3627><s%> vessels חֶמְדָּֽה׃ <S%H2532><s%> of all pleasant

תֶּאְשַׁם֙ <S%H816><s%> shall become desolate שֹֽׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for מָרְתָ֖ה <S%H4784><s%> for she hath rebelled בֵּֽאלֹהֶ֑יהָ <S%H430><s%> against her God בַּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword יִפֹּ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> they shall fall עֹלְלֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H5768><s%> their infants יְרֻטָּ֔שׁוּ <S%H7376><s%> shall be dashed in pieces וְהָרִיּוֹתָ֖יו <S%H2030><s%> and their women with child יְבֻקָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H1234><s%> shall be ripped up פ
